title: Why do boards act like kills dont give gold?
body: Almost every time someone is whining about adc or any other champ if you look in their match history x champ was obnoxiously fed and several items/levels up on the people they were one shotting. Like the kid who made a post about a fed draven shredding a team that had 3 armor items total lol. If you don't want to play a game where skill matters go play overwatch or other games where kills don't give you resources.

replies.body:
I fail to see a connection between any of these points.

People not building mitigation because they are boosted rodents has nothing to do with an ADC being fed, although being fed helps a little.

Gold drops on kills have fuck all to do with skill. OW has a pretty high skill ceiling as well.

OW is almost impossible to solo carry because putting up 40 elims doesn't matter if your team doesn't do anything with the death timers, there is no getting fed and 1v9 like mobas and people crying about adc being op and then building glass cannon vs a fed draven shows they have no understanding of the game.
